job.title: Site Reliability Engineer Lead - Remote
job.description:
Details are as follows:

Job position: Site Reliability Engineer Lead

Location : Remote

Duration: 12 months+ [Long term]

Immediate Interview/ Start


**Please NOTE: We have positions open in CANADA and US both **


  • 10+ years Total IT experience.
  • Healthcare experience is required
  • Experience of at least 5 years within an Enterprise SRE configuration (Mandatory)
  • L2 L3 Productions support
  • Blue Green deployment
  • Managed on site and off site resources
  • AWS: 4 years (Mandatory)- AWS Cost Optimization, Developing applications in an AWS environment & Terraform.
  • Debugging production issues: 4+ years (Mandatory). Python: 2-3 years (Mandatory) - DJango, Celery.
  • Good to have: AWS Certified.
  • Experience in with development technology stack-Docker, Python, Django, Celery, Postgres.
  • AWS serverless technologies (Lambda, Cognito, API Gateway, Step Functions, AppSync)
  • Experience in operational technology stack (Uwsgi, Nginx, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch, Redis).
  • Experience with automation tools- Salt, Vagrant, Packer.
  • Experience with metrics and orchestration tools-Jenkins, NewRelic, Datadog, Loggly.
  • He/ She needs to be the best buddy of Key IT Stakeholders and sponsors.
